I've been looking at some gorgeous Christmas-themed ceramics this afternoon (winter florals) - a shopping trip may be in order this weekend!

Head down, writing an article about a glassmaker for the December issue...

And... what do you think of the new cover?
October issue is on sale today! Full of vintage tea ware and other beautiful things - and interesting articles, of course!

Vintage lovers will adore the October issue – pretty from the cover to almost the last page, but Mark Hill is better described as handsome!

... and did I say I need it NOW!
